laboratory_examinations.findings: Multiple lesions initially thought to be areas of focal fatty sparing
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up ultrasound in 2021 showed a markedly echogenic and heterogeneous liver. The largest measured adenoma was 13 mm superficially in the left lobe (previously up to 11 mm), with others generally around 6 mm in diameter.

laboratory_examinations.findings: An enlarged liver with diffuse fat infiltration and multiple numerous focal lesions suggestive of multiple adenomas (adenomatosis)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: All MRI scans show no significant interval changes in the number or size of the adenomas.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Absence of the paternal allele at 15q11-q13 due to abnormal methylation, suggesting a defect in imprinting.
